title: PersonallyIdentifiableInformation
description: This is an example PII record type for PrivCloud. This example is to show what it looks like to define a PII record type in PrivCloud. All record types in PrivCloud follow the JSON Schema specification (https://json-schema.org). More examples can be found on the PrivCloud GitHub site and here @ https://json-schema.org/learn/miscellaneous-examples.html

age.description: Age in years which must be equal to or greater than zero.
age.comment: By default, all records in PrivCloud are encrypted. Use 'encrypt': false to store the data in PrivCloud unencrypted. This is useful for searching and reporting.

zip.description: The zip code associated with the credit card.

emailAddresses.description: The list of email addresses for the person.

email.description: An email address. The pattern below isn't the best for email addresses, but it servers the purpose for the example.
